languages.text: "Довольно!" {n}Алые глаза Кассии полны презрения, а голос непривычно груб. Под ее взглядом навигатор невольно сжимается в трясущийся ком.{/n} "Атлас необходимо сохранить и использовать на благо Империума! Клан Сеттала, я... Тисифона и множество моих подданных уже заплатили своими жизнями за могущество, дарованное Дому Орселлио. И я докажу, что их жертвы не были напрасны".

traits.locale_text: "Довольно! {n}Алые глаза Кассии полны презрения, а голос непривычно груб. Под ее взглядом Навигатор невольно сжимается в трясущийся ком.{/n} "Атлас необходимо сохранить и использовать на благо Империума! Клан Сеттала, я... Тисифона и множество моих подданных уже заплатили своими жизнями за могущество, дарованное Дому Орселлио. И я докажу, что их жертвы не были напрасны".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Enough!" {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh. The Navigator cannot help but shrink into a quivering ball under her gaze.{/n} "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium! The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. And I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."
languages.original_text: "Довольно!" {n}Алые глаза Кассии полны презрения, а голос непривычно груб. Под ее взглядом навигатор невольно сжимается в трясущийся ком.{/n} "Атлас необходимо сохранить и использовать на благо Империума! Клан Сеттала, я... Тисифона и множество моих подданных уже заплатили своими жизнями за могущество, дарованное Дому Орселлио. И я докажу, что их жертвы не были напрасны".

The Navigator cannot help but shrink into a quivering ball under her gaze.{/n} "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium! The Setthala clan. My subjects. Even myse— Tisiphone. Many have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. And I shall prove that their sacrifices weren't in vain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「もう十分です！」{n}カシアの赤い瞳は軽蔑に満ちており、その声は柄にもなく辛辣だ。その視線にさらされた航宙士は震える球体となって縮こまるしかない。{/n}「アトラスは保存し、帝国の利益のために使わなくてはなりません。セッタラ家、あたくし自身…ティシフォン、そして多くの家臣たちはすでにオーセリオ家の力のために己の生涯を費やしています。あたくしには、その犠牲が無駄ではなかったと証明する義務があります」
languages.original_text: "Enough!" {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh. The Navigator cannot help but shrink into a quivering ball under her gaze.{/n} "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium! The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. And I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: 「もう十分です！」{n}カシアの赤い瞳は軽蔑に満ちており、その声は柄にもなく辛辣だ。その視線にさらされた航宙士は震える球体となって縮こまるしかない。{/n}「アトラスは保存し、帝国の利益のために使わなくてはなりません。セッタラ家、あたくし自身…ティシフォン、そして多くの家臣たちはすでにオーセリオ家の力のために己の生涯を費やしています。あたくしには、その犠牲が無駄ではなかったと証明する義務があります」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “够了！”{n}卡西娅的红眼睛里充满了蔑视的意味，声音也一反常态地严厉。在她的注视之下，那位导航者不禁缩成一团，瑟瑟发抖。{/n}“为了帝国的利益，圣仪必须被保存下来！无论是塞塔拉氏族，我自己……提西福涅，还是我的无数臣民，都为奥赛罗家族的力量付出了生命的代价，我要保证他们的牺牲不会白费。”
languages.original_text: "Enough!" {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh. The Navigator cannot help but shrink into a quivering ball under her gaze.{/n} "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium! The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. And I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: “够了！”{n}卡西娅的红眼睛里充满了蔑视的意味，声音也一反常态地严厉。在她的注视之下，那位导航者不禁缩成一团，瑟瑟发抖。{/n}“为了帝国的利益，圣仪必须被保存下来！无论是塞塔拉氏族，我自己……提西福涅，还是我的无数臣民，都为奥塞罗家族的力量付出了生命的代价，我要保证他们的牺牲不会白费。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Assez parlé ! » {n}intervient Cassia sur un ton étonnamment sec, ses yeux rouges pleins de mépris. Le navigateur ne peut s'empêcher de se ratatiner sous la sévérité de son regard.{/n} « L'Atlas doit être préservé et ses capacités exploitées pour le bien de l'Imperium. Le clan Setthala, moi-même... Tisiphone et bien d'autres de mes sujets ont donné leur vie pour permettre à la maison Orsellio de s'élever. Il est de mon devoir de m'assurer que leur sacrifice n'aura pas été vain. »
languages.original_text: "Enough!" {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh. The Navigator cannot help but shrink into a quivering ball under her gaze.{/n} "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium! The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. And I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: « Assez parlé ! » {n}intervient Cassia sur un ton étonnamment sec, ses yeux rouges pleins de mépris. Le navigateur ne peut s'empêcher de se ratatiner sous la sévérité de son regard.{/n} « L'Atlas doit être préservé et ses capacités exploitées pour le bien de l'Imperium. Le clan Setthala, moi-même... Tisiphone et bien d'autres de mes sujets ont donné leur vie pour permettre à la maison Orsellio de s'élever. Il est de mon devoir de m'assurer que leur sacrifice n'aura pas été vain. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ya basta!». {n}Los ojos rojos de Cassia están llenos de desprecio y su voz está revestida de una severidad inusitada. El Navegante no puede evitar encogerse y temblar ante su mirada.{/n} «¡Debemos preservar el Atlas y utilizarlo por el bien del Imperium! El clan Setthala, yo misma... Tisiphone y muchos de mis súbditos ya han pagado con sus vidas por el poder de la casa Orsellio. Y es mi deber demostrar que sus sacrificios no han sido en vano».
languages.original_text: "Enough!" {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh. The Navigator cannot help but shrink into a quivering ball under her gaze.{/n} "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium! The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. And I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ya basta!». {n}Los ojos rojos de Cassia están llenos de desprecio y su voz está revestida de una severidad inusitada. El Navegante no puede evitar encogerse y temblar ante su mirada.{/n} «¡Debemos preservar el Atlas y utilizarlo por el bien del Imperium! El clan Setthala, yo misma... Tisiphone y muchos de mis súbditos ya han pagado con sus vidas por el poder de la casa Orsellio. Y es mi deber demostrar que sus sacrificios no han sido en vano».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Genug gesagt!" {n}Cassias rote Augen sind voller Verachtung, ihre Stimme ist ungewöhnlich harsch. Der Navigator kann nicht anders, als unter ihrem Blick zu einem zitternden Häuflein Elend zusammenzuschrumpfen.{/n} "Der Atlas muss für das Wohl des Imperiums bewahrt und genutzt werden! Der Setthala-Clan, ich selbst ... Tisiphone und viele meiner Untertanen haben bereits mit dem Leben für Haus Orsellios Macht bezahlt. Und ich werde beweisen, dass ihr Opfer nicht umsonst war."
languages.original_text: "Enough!" {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh. The Navigator cannot help but shrink into a quivering ball under her gaze.{/n} "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium! The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. And I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Genug gesagt!" {n}Cassias rote Augen sind voller Verachtung, ihre Stimme ist ungewöhnlich harsch. Der Navigator kann nicht anders, als unter ihrem Blick zu einem zitternden Häuflein Elend zusammenzuschrumpfen.{/n} "Der Atlas muss für das Wohl des Imperiums bewahrt und genutzt werden! Der Setthala-Clan, ich selbst ... Tisiphone und viele meiner Untertanen haben bereits mit dem Leben für Haus Orsellios Macht bezahlt. Und ich werde beweisen, dass ihr Opfer nicht umsonst war."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Yeter!" {n}Cassia'nın kırmızı gözlerinden nefret akıyor, sesi ise alışılmadık bir biçimde sert. Cassia'nın bakışları karşısında Rotacı, elinde olmadan titremeye başlıyor.{/n} "Atlas'ı muhafaza edip İmparatorluk'un çıkarları uğruna kullanmalıyız! Setthala klanı, kendim... Tisiphone ve kullarımdan pek çoğu; Orsellio Hanesi güç kazanabilsin diye canlarından oldu. Bu fedakârlıklarının boşuna olmadığını kanıtlayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Enough!" {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh. The Navigator cannot help but shrink into a quivering ball under her gaze.{/n} "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium! The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. And I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Yeter!" {n}Cassia'nın kırmızı gözlerinden nefret akıyor. Sesi ise alışılmadık bir biçimde sert. Cassia'nın bakışları karşısında Rotacı, elinde olmadan titremeye başlıyor.{/n} "Atlas'ı muhafaza edip İmparatorluk'un çıkarları uğruna kullanmalıyız! Setthala klanı, kendim... Tisiphone ve kullarımdan pek çoğu; Orsellio Hanesi'nin güç kazanması için canlarıyla bedel ödedi bile. Onların bu fedakârlıklarının boşuna olmadığını kanıtlayacağım."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
